name: Commander
description: A path focused on leadership and inspiring allies in battle

skills.name: Battlefield Presence
skills.description: Allied creatures within 5 yards of you can use a triggered action once per round to make challenge rolls with 1 boon to resist becoming frightened or to overcome the frightened affliction.

skills.name: Rally
skills.description: You can use an action to choose one creature within short range that can see and hear you. The creature can immediately make a Will challenge roll with 1 boon. On a success, it removes one of the following afflictions from itself: charmed, frightened, stunned, or dazed. Once you use this talent, you cannot use it again until after you complete a rest.

skills.name: Combat Leader
skills.description: You and allied creatures within 5 yards can use a triggered action to stand up from being prone without spending half their Speed.

skills.name: Quick Orders
skills.description: You can use Rally as a triggered action on your turn. Once you use this talent, you cannot use it again until after you complete a rest.

skills.name: Battlefield Commander
skills.description: You can use an action to choose up to three different allied creatures within 10 yards of you. Each chosen creature can immediately use a triggered action to make one attack, move up to half its Speed, or stand up. Once you use this talent, you cannot use it again until after you complete a rest.

skills.name: Leading by Example
skills.description: When you score an exceptional success on an attack roll, one allied creature of your choice within 5 yards of you can make one attack against a target you can see within its reach or range by using a triggered action.
